name: SVProgressHUD
summary: A clean and lightweight progress HUD for your iOS and tvOS app.
description: SVProgressHUD is a clean and easy-to-use HUD meant to display the progress of an ongoing task on iOS and tvOS. Itâ€™s a simplified alternative to the popular MBProgressHUD. The success and error icons are from Freepik from Flaticon and are licensed under Creative Commons BY 3.0.
